description:
Back at base, Dr. Riddles talks about meeting Sherry and Brago. All the other mamodo are shocked to hear that Zatch and Kiyo have battled Brago and lived!  Tia wants to thank Zatch for saving her earlier but her shyness prevents her from telling him how s
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 暴走!? ティオの告白大作戦!
